page.title: 12Walmer Residents/Ratepayers
page.content: The Walmer Residents and Ratepayers Association is a group of people that looks after their interests. The Ratepayers have been going since 1971. People in Walmer are complaining about plans to build houses and industrial buildings and objects that will spoil the area. People complain about road surfaces and country{conservation.}The dirty beaches in Walmer and Deal are caused by fishermen and people object to fishermen parking on the promenade. On the corner of Church Street there's an old school and the local people hope soon it will be a{Community {Centre.}In the 1990's we might have a swimming pool in Walmer or Deal. The Walmer Ratepayers has{300 members}and each household pay Â£1.50 per year. They hold a meeting twice a year and send out a{newsletter.}All complaints are dealt with by a committee of 12.
